item.title: Npc giving slayer xp when dead?
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

[quote=“dd, post:6, topic:201838”]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == IDHERE) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("Wow, you killed this newb!"); ppl.addSkillXP(50000, 18); }[/quote]

Doesnt work…

Rolling what you on about lol?

item.title: Npc giving slayer xp when dead?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

I think this is how it goes

[code]if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3496) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[18]), 18);[/code]

Have to put a space, change the id btw. If your npchandler using p. instead of ppl. change it

EDIT: just put a space between client ppl\p ten add the p or ppl addskillxp w\e stuff and put it in the format your npchandler has it.

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 41) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[18]), 18); }

Read full topic

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 41) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[18]), 18); }

This basically should say once u killed a chicken u said get 100*ur lvl…

It wont work, gives 2 errors.
